Ragnar expressed his relief by straitghtening a bit. He was a warrior, 
but so did those two seem to be, and not weaklings. He transformed.

Ragnar: I followed the signal sent by this pod. I have come here on 
behalf of Commander Rodimus Prime of the Maximals. He sends his 
greetings and would wish you to join our group.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Windlord::
> 
> "Regards Ragnar"said Windlord"I'm Windlord and he " said pointed to 
> Aerotaur "it's my friend Aerotaur... What do you want to speak with 
> us ???  How do you find us?"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > OOC: Sorry... Its been a few days since I haven't posted, right? 
^^
> > 
> > Bic:
> > 
> > Ragnar: Roger, Commander, and thanks for the hint.
> > 
> > He moved closer to the forms and brought his arm pod weapons to 
the 
> > ground so they would not think of any hostilities in his moves.
> > 
> > Ragnar: Unknown beings, I am Warrior Ragnar of the Maximals. I 
wish 
> > to speak with you.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> > > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > > 
> > > Rodimus was still walking to the control room when Ragnar came 
> over 
> > the comm system.
> > > 
> > > Rodimus Prime: If there seems to be no danger, then I suggest 
you 
> > make contact. I hope we will be able to bring in a new Maximal.
> > >   ----- Original Message ----- 
> > >   From: warriorazure 
> > >   To: nbwrpg@y... 
> > >   Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 8:58 AM
> > >   Subject: Re: Maximal signal/Windlord and Aerotaur.
> > > 
> > > 
> > >   Ragnar stopped just meters from the pod. He looked in all 
> > directions 
> > >   to try to catch something on his sensors. As he did, he opened 
> a 
> > >   commline with the base.
> > > 
> > >   Ragnar: Maximal base, this is Bear Alpha. I have arrived at 
the 
> > >   designated location. Visual and Infrared scanners indicate no 
> > threat, 
> > >   but magres shows two metallic object moving slightly and 
> > seemingly 
> > >   humanoid. I await orders. Bear Alpha out.
> > > 
> > >   --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > >   > Windlord::
> > >   > 
> > >   > "I hope that I won't belogn a faction like the named 
> > Tripedocus" 
> > >   siad

> > >   > 
> > >   >

> > weapon.  He 
> > >   > kept it 
> > >   > > drawn just in case he needed it though.  "So we'll finally 
> > find 
> > >   out 
> > >   > who you 
> > >   > > were supposed to be.  If only I was that lucky.
